content: With the Back Scratcher equipped, you will get a considerable increase to your maximum stamina, making the Back Scratcher one of the best Curios items in the game. You may even end up using it for the entirety of the rest of your through if it fits your build.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Back_Scratcher.md', within the main section titled 'Back Scratcher'.
The content is as follows:
With the Back Scratcher equipped, you will get a considerable increase to your maximum stamina, making the Back Scratcher one of the best Curios items in the game. You may even end up using it for the entirety of the rest of your through if it fits your build.
